item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 46E12
item.description:
Nov 8, 04:27 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 08/11/2023 03h47 UTC
End time : 08/11/2023 04h20 UTC
Root cause : Electrical disjunction.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 8, 04:05 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 08/11/2023 03h47 UTCC
Service impact : Servers are unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GRA][Dedicated Servers] - G117A14
item.description:
Nov 7, 18:59 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 07/11/2023 17:16 UTC
End time : 07/11/2023 18:55 UTC
Service status: The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally..
Root cause: It was due to a malfunction on a power supply.

Nov 7, 18:00 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Nov 7, 17:54 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/11/2023 17:16 UTC
Service impact : Some servers are unreachable in this rack.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
Related incident : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/3bp2lmmln1l4

item.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - End of Life Real Time Monitoring APIv6
item.description:
Nov 7, 10:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 7, 09:31 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 22, 11:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/11/2023 09:30 UTC
End time : 07/11/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : The End of Life of Real Time Monitoring (RTM) for baremetal is scheduled for the 7th of November 2023.
Few customers will be impacted (less than 10) and will stop be able to monitor their dedicated servers via the APIv6. This will impact APIv6 calls /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/statistics.
